title: Bug 18028: Rename package doesn't check if all resources are writeable
description: When renaming a package, the system does not check if all of the resources within the package are writable. This can cause unexpected exceptions to occur after the renaming process is finished.
EB: The precondition checking for package renaming should include a verification step to check for read-only files within the package.
SR:
F1+ Create a package with a compilation unit (CU) inside it.
Make the CU read-only.
Attempt to rename the package.
Observe: After the renaming process is complete, an unexpected exception dialog is displayed.
